ModMetaData.name: Combat Power Tweaker
ModMetaData.author: Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
This mod lets you modify the combat power of all pawn-kinds. The combat power is what a pawn "costs" when a raid is created, so a lower cost means more units. So dont lower the Centipiedes value to 1 unless you want a real challenge :)
Commisioned by: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198068907991]u w u[/url] Based on code by: Taranchuk Recoded by: Mlie
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/CombatPowerTweaker][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
